name: ots
description: OTS (One Time Secret) is a self-hosted service for securely sharing sensitive information. Links expire after viewing, preventing reuse. It's ideal for sending passwords or credentials with privacy.
features: One-time links: Generate URLs that expire immediately after being viewed once to prevent reuse.
Encryption: Encrypt secrets client-side before transmission so the server never sees plaintext content.
Time expiration: Set automatic deletion times for secrets that haven't been viewed within a specified period.
Password protection: Add an additional password requirement to access secrets for extra security layer.
No registration: Share secrets without creating accounts or providing personal information for quick use.
Burn notification: Optionally receive confirmation when a secret has been viewed and destroyed.
API access: Integrate secret sharing into applications and scripts using simple REST endpoints.
Self-hosted privacy: Keep sensitive data on your own infrastructure without trusting third-party services.
